I've heard of a few of this guy's songs in various movies, but I've just recently looked up more of his works.  He's almost a swoon singer, but at the same time, not really.  Thanks for the upload.

Rufus in high school prom terms is like not the hottest chick that showed up, but she's the one you're going to marry. He doesn't make you swoon all the way. No, he makes you swoon only 3/4 of the way, and he keeps the rest personal and real. A complete swoon would have entailed sociopathic behavior. 

And I have no idea why I said that. 

Thank you for this.
